categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Scouter was a Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transport used by the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. The transport participated in the First Battle of the Pakuuni system, attacking an abandoned cargo area near the planet Argoon. The transport was destroyed in the battle.
The Scouter was a transport ship that appeared in the PC Game Star Wars: TIE Fighter in Battle 3 Mission 1 as an enemy target. The transport was considered a bonus objective to be destroyed.
